stimulusHtml: Hokusaiâ€™s Under the Wave off Kanagawa (Kanagawa oki nami ura) demonstrates the influence of European art on his work in its use of
choicesHtml: shading to suggest forms with volume, which recalls Italian Renaissance art
a composition with a low horizon line, which is indicative of Dutch painting
subject matter depicting everyday life, which was typical of Impressionism
hatching and crosshatching, which were employed in German printmaking
